QuestData.Title: WANTED: Wyvern Poachers
QuestData.Description:
Soldiers of the Horde!
A few nights ago some foolish human soundrels snuck off with one of our strongest wyverns.
If anybody can track down and stop these thieves, a reward awaits!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Lindel and his partner Silent Boris cannot be allowed to hijack any more wyverns!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Lindel the Snatcher and Silent Boris.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Mukkral Blackvein in the Wolf's Den.
